enchantment.archeryexp.scouting.desc: Increases movement speed whilst charging a bow.
enchantment.archeryexp.baby_face.desc: Hitting a target with an arrow gives you a speed boost.
enchantment.archeryexp.follow_through.de: Hitting a target with an arrow gives you a strength boost.
enchantment.archeryexp.grit.desc: Grants Resistance whilst charging a bow.
enchantment.archeryexp.shattering.desc: Arrows shot have a 5% chance to deal an extra 5% (per level) of an armourâ€™s overall durability damage to it.
enchantment.archeryexp.trajectory.desc: Visualises the trajectory of your arrows.
enchantment.archeryexp.headshot.desc: Arrows that strike the target's head deal 1.5+ damage per level.
enchantment.archeryexp.fragility.desc: Armour is susceptible to taking 2+ extra damage to arrows per level.
enchantment.archeryexp.pincushioning.des: The Quickdraw effect is permanently applied whilst the armour is worn.
effect.archeryexp.quickdraw.description: After firing an arrow, the shooter is left vulnerable, making them susceptible to extra damage.
